content:
My apologies for misunderstanding your question. Here are some recommendations for books in the Romance genre by female authors:

1. "Pride and Prejudice" by Jane Austen
2. "Outlander" by Diana Gabaldon
3. "The Bridges of Madison County" by Robert James Waller
4. "The Time Traveler's Wife" by Audrey Niffenegger
5. "The Notebook" by Nicholas Sparks
6. "The Rosie Project" by Graeme Simsion
7. "The Wedding Date" by Jasmine Guillory
8. "The Hating Game" by Sally Thorne
9. "Me Before You" by Jojo Moyes
10. "The Kiss Quotient" by Helen Hoang
